macro.name: Lay on Hands
macro.author: UjfixXuqstXNdypa

description.value:
Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of hit points equal to your Paladin level Ã— 5.

As an action, you can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool.

Alternatively, you can expend 5 hit points from your pool of healing to cure the target of one disease or neutralize one poison affecting it. You can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands, expending hit points separately for each one.

This feature has not effect on undead and constructs.

DM Note: Enable Character Sheet Hook in Item Macro's module settings. Alternatively, you can add the @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-macros.couCfqHU2tDB1RBn]{Lay on Hands} macro to your hotbar.

activation.condition: Target cannot be Undead or a Construct.
